Ya compraron su propio terreno y están edificando su casa, al costado de la casa del padre de Marisol, en la ciudad de Pampas, Huancavelica. Una vez allí, ella planea continuar su negocio de venta de ropa, pero ya desde su casa.

Ella es parte del grupo “Ichicruz” y éste es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, como anteriormente. Los integrantes de su asociación son personas solidarias y responsables, por lo que ella se siente a gusto.
Marisol invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de tierra, palos y otros materiales para la construcción de su casa en la ciudad de Pampas y establecerse pronto allí.
texts.en:
Marisol, age 20, has been married to Edgar for one year.  They do not have children yet, but they eagerly hope to have one when the time is right.

Edgar started working in the capital (Lima) in a pants factory.  That is why Marisol also spends a lot of time working there selling clothes.

However, they both wish to establish themselves in their town, where they have a lot of plans to progress and be with their loved ones.  They bought their own land, and they are building their house alongside Marisol’s father’s house in the city of Pampas, Huancavelica.  Once they are there, she plans to continue her business of selling clothes from her house.

She is part of the Ichicruz group, and this is her second loan with MFP.  She pledges to be punctual with her payments, as she was previously.  The members of her communal bank are supportive and responsible people.   That is why she feels so comfortable.

Marisol will use the requested money to buy soil, sticks, and other construction materials for her house in the city of Pampas.  She will quickly establish herself there.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish her house.

loans.name: Nget

texts.en:
Nget is 60 years old and a single parent of a married child. She is residing with her child in Reussey Keo district. Nget acts as a good housewife at home. Her son is the main income provider of the family. He is a professional electrician working for a company in Phnom Penh city. Typically, he is able to earn approximately USD 7.00 per day to satisfy the living needs.

Nget is now asking for a loan of USD 1,200 to repair her present house, which suffers from the rain during the rainy season. She hopes that she is able to provide good living conditions for her family. She borrowed loans from HKL six times already and this will be her seventh loan. She is an honest client of our firm. She paid off her previous loans successfully.

loans.use: to repair her present house.

loans.name: Julio Armando

texts.es: Julio Armando habita en casa familiar junto con su esposa. A sus 63 años sigue trabajando duramente ya que es un hombre trabajador el cual prefiere trabajar a estar en la casa sin hacer nada. Además porque necesita ganarse el pan de cada día para poder sobrevivir. El se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace mucho tiempo. Compra frutas como nance, mango y semilla de paterna, frutras muy solicitadas por clientes, las cuales son cosechadas en la zona y luego las prepara y las pone  a la venta. El aprovecha cuando es temporada de fruta ya que así puede adquirirla más barata y venderla a precios más cómodos. Tiene muy buenas referencia por parte de sus vecinos, y cuenta con experiencia en el manejo de créditos, por lo que esta seguro que podrá cancelar su obligación, ya que gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de frutas y verduras para seguir con su negocio ya que es la única forma de ingresos con la que cuenta. Vive en condiciones muy humildes y espera que con su trabajo poco a poco ésta vaya mejorando.
texts.en:
Julio Armando lives with his wife in the family home. At 63, he continues to work hard, as he is a a hard-working man who prefers working to being home doing nothing. Besides, he needs to earn his living every day in order to survive.

He has been selling fruits and vegetables for a long time. He buys fruits such as nance (a small, sweet, tropical fruit), mangos and paterna seeds (paterna is a type of legume). These are products much requested by his customers, that are harvested in the area, and which he then prepares and puts out for sale. 

He takes advantage of the fruit season, as this way he can acquire fruit more cheaply, and sell it at more convenient prices.

He has very good references from his neighbors, and has experience managing credit, so he is confident that he will be able to pay off his obligation. Thanks to his charm, he has found out how to win the trust of many people.

He has made the decision to apply for this loan from Integral, in order to invest in his business of buying fruits and vegetables. This is so that he can continue with his business, as it is the only form of income that he has. He lives in very humble circumstances and hopes that through his work, these will gradually improve.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables such as nance (a small sweet tropical fruit), paterna seeds (a type of legume), and mangos.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Las 14 integrantes cuentan con actividades comerciales variadas, cada una de ellas trabaja mucho para poder ayudar a sus familiares, son muy luchadoras y por sobre todo emprendedoras.
 Maria Estela trabaja en la venta de comestibles de todo tipo, y comenta que ya tiene una buena clientela ya que sus comidas son muy solicitadas porque ella tiene muy buena sazón. Comenta que su meta es poder tener un gran local de comidas donde poder deleitar a sus clientes con más variedad de platillos y a la vez darles comodidad.
En vistas a cumplir su meta es que siempre se esfuerza, esta vez solicita el crédito para la compra de panificados, verduras, carne, jamón, queso, condimentos y demás insumos para poder haciendo sus comidas y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia y a la vez estar cada vez más cerca de sus sueños.
texts.en:
These 14 members engage in various commercial activities. Each one of them works very hard to help their families. They are determined and, above all, enterprising.

Maria Estela works by selling food of all types. She says that she has a good customer base and her dishes are frequently requested because of their good flavor. Maria Estela says that her goal is to have a large food establishment where she can delight her customers with a wider variety of dishes and make them more comfortable. She is constantly striving to see her goal accomplished. This time she is requesting a loan in order to buy baked goods, vegetables, beef, ham, cheese, condiments, and other supplies for preparing her dishes. This will help her continue supporting her family and moving one step closer to her dreams.

loans.use: to buy baked goods, vegetables, beef, ham, cheese, condiments, and other supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 37 años, está casada con Enrique desde hace 13 años. Tiene cinco hijos pequeños, y viven en la casa de su suegra, ubicada en la localidad de Ichicruz. 
Desde el primer rayo de sol y junto a su canasta, Elizabeth se dirige a una de las calles más céntricas de su localidad para vender los panes calientitos y frescos, que ya todos sus clientes prefieren. Culminando este trabajo, realiza el pastoreo de sus vacas y de otras ajenas por lo que le pagan un sueldo mensual, pues es reconocida entre su comunidad por se una persona responsable y muy dedicada en el cuidado del ganado. Por ahora no tiene mucha producción de leche, pero espera muy pronto aumentar la cantidad y calidad de sus vacas. Además de criar otros animales como gallina, ovejas y cerdos para venderlos a los carniceros. 
Actualmente está ahorrando dinero para comprar su propia casa, pues su esposo comenzó a trabajar en una construcción, de donde espera obtener buenas ganancias, además que adicionalmente él realizar trasporte de pasajeros, los fines de semana, con el motocarro que poseen.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Ichicruz”  y éste es el octavo préstamo con MFP. Agradece el apoyo que le brindan, ya que adquiere el capital de trabajo que necesita para poder trabajar y progresar en su negocio. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que los integrantes de su asociación son personas solidarias y responsables.
Elizabeth invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca lechera de buena calidad, para aumentar la producción de leche.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 37 years old. She has been married to Enrique for 13 years. She has five small children, and they live in her mother-in-law's house, located in the town of Ichicruz.

From the first light of the sun and with her basket, Elizabeth goes to one of the most central streets in her town to sell hot, fresh bread, which all of her customers prefer already. Finishing this work, she tends to her own cows and to those belonging to others, for which she is paid a monthly salary. She is recognized in her community for being a responsible person and very dedicated in caring for the cattle. At the moment they aren't producing much milk, but she hopes very soon to increase the quantity and quality of her cows. She also hopes to raise other animals such as chickens, sheep, and pigs in order to sell them to butchers. 

Currently she is saving money to buy her own house, since her husband started to work on a construction site, where he hopes to make good earnings. He also transports passengers on the weekend with the three-wheeled car they have.

She belongs to the "Ichicruz" communal bank, and this is the eighth loan with MFP. She is thankful for the help they give her, since she obtains the working capital she needs to be able to work and progress in her business. She promises to be punctual with her repayments, since the members of her communal bank are supportive and responsible people.

Elizabeth will invest the money requested in the purchase of a good-quality milk cow to increase milk production.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 30 years old and single. He sells bananas and he has three years of experience in this business. Emmanuel currently employs two people to help him and his business is open from 8 am to 6 pm every day except Sunday.

Emmanuel has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase more bananas for re-sale. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and re-invest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more bananas for re-sale.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is taking another loan to invest in her new business of selling clothes. She sells her clothes to the general public in her shop. Since the last loan, her business is progressing well and her living standards have improved. The loan of KSH 50,000 will enable her to purchase bundles of clothes for sale.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes for sale.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 39 years old, married to Ann, and they are blessed with one child. He runs a retail shop. He has been in this business for the last twelve years and gets an income of KES 15,000 per month.

He is applying for his tenth loan of KES 80,000 from KADET LTD which he plans to use to buy stock like sugar, maize flour, cooking oil, and sodas.

He will use the extra profit to invest and expand his business. He hopes to expand his business and improve his family livelihood.

loans.use: To buy maize flour, cooking oil, sugar, and sodas

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 36 years old and lives in a small village with his family: his wife, daughter Ana (2 years old) and a mother. The family runs an agricultural business. David has a vineyard, and grows corn and melons as well. He is very hard working and takes good care of his land. He sells his product on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 550 Lari. 

David has requested a loan to expand his agricultural business. He wants to plow the land and sow more corn and melons. With this loan he will be able to take good care of the vineyard. Thus, he wants to expand his business. David will sell his harvested product on the local open market and will get the desired profit. With increased profits he will be able to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds to sow and cultivate his agricultural land

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Don Miguel caballero luchador y honesto. Continua laborando para una zona franca desarrollandose como operario de maquina aunque una de sus aspiraciones es optar a un mejor empleo para este año venidero. El junto a su esposa han luchado para ir poco a poco realizandole mejoras a su hogar pero debido a los altos costos de los materiales y demas obligaciones que tienen que cubrir en su casa se le ha tornado dificil finalizar la construccion de su humilde morada, razon por la que acude una vez mas a Afodenic que ha sido el medio que ha proporcionado estas mejoras. Sus planes con esta nueva oportunidad de credito es la instalacion de ceramica en su vivienda, logrando con ella mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Don Miguel is a determined and honest gentleman. He continues to work in the free trade zone as a machine operator, but one of his future goals is to find a better job next year. Miguel and his wife strive to gradually make improvements to their home, but the high cost of materials and their other household obligations have made it difficult for them to complete the construction of their humble abode.

For this reason, Miguel has come to AFODENIC once again to seek funding for these improvements. His plan for this new loan is to install ceramic flooring in his home, which will provide better living conditions.

loans.use: to install ceramic flooring in his home.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 31 años, está casado con Luisa hace 3 años, tienen una hija, Nayely, a la que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.
Desde muy joven él comenzó a producir su propio ingreso económico trabajando en varias actividades; una de ellas es la agricultura, oficio que heredó de sus padres. Pasaron los años, conformó su familia y junto a su esposa también se dedican a este oficio. En la actualidad, poseen terrenos agrícolas que les fueron otorgados por sus padres, ahí comenzaron a sembrar papa, maíz y otros tubérculos. Todo esto con la ayuda de su esposa, quien se dedica a administrar los ingresos y egresos del dinero. Adicionalmente, Alejandro comenzó a dedicarse a la construcción, trabajando como albañil tiene muchos contratos que terminar, uno de ellos es la construcción de una fábrica de productos lácteos en una zona ganadera de la ciudad. Ahí espera obtener buena ganancias y ahorrar lo necesario para comprar más animales de los que posee, ya que solo pudo adquirir 2 toros, una vaca y 2 cerdos.

Éste es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, donde obtuvo el apoyo que tanto necesitaba. Por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que su asociación lo integran personas responsables con él. 
Alejandro invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semillas de papa y fertilizantes naturales para nutrir sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Alejandro, 31, has been married to Luisa for three years.  They have a daughter, Nayely, for whom they care in their own house located in the town of Pampas.  When he was very young he began to earn his own income working in various jobs.

One of them is agriculture, a trade he inherited from his parents.  The years went by and he formed his family, and he and his wife also do this work.  Currently they have crop lands inherited from his parents where they began to grow potatoes, corn, and other tubers, all with the help of his wife, who manages the income and expenditures.

Alejandro also began to work in construction as a bricklayer.  He has a lot of contracts to finish, one of which is a dairy-products factory in a ranching area of the city.  He hopes to get good profits from that and save what he needs to buy more animals than he has, because he managed to acquire only two bulls, a cow, and two pigs.

This is the second loan he has had from MFP, where he got the support he needed so much.  This is why he promises to be punctual with his payments, because his communal bank is made up of responsible people.

Alejandro will invest the requested money in buying potato seed and natural fertilizer to nourish his crops.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda operates a grocery shop at Edukrom near Cape Coast. She has done this for 2 years. The items in her grocery shop are tin fish, tin tomatoes, milo, different kinds of drinks, biscuits, toffees, milk, soap, etc. She is married and has 1 child. Linda uses her income to support her husband in paying their child’s school fees. She will use her loan to purchase a variety of groceries to sell. With the new profit, Linda plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mundia

texts.en:
Mundia is 48 years old. He is married and has six children who are all in school. He runs a mobile money transfer business in his hometown of Mongu, where he is fondly known as The Pioneer. He has been running this business since 2009 and It is his only source of income.

Having attended his primary, secondary and college education in three different provinces, he can speak five local languages. This, he says, will be invaluable as he goes about his expansion plan. Before he started running his mobile money transfers business, Mundia served his community as a police officer and worked with a local bank as a team sales leader.  He describes himself as persistent and hardworking. These qualities have helped him keep running his business.

Being one of the first people to start running a mobile money transfer business through Mobile Transactions Zambia (MTZ), Mundia has grown his business from scratch. He recalls that when he first started, he would only have five customers a day, which is a far cry from the 100+ who now transact with him on a daily basis.  He has since managed to employ four people who help him attend to customers.

Mundia believes that the Kiva loan will help him alleviate his major challenge of having low working capital. He would like to use the money to open more outlets in his province as he is convinced that more people are in need of sending and receiving money instantly and cheaply. His expanded business will help more members of the community access this service.

He has high hopes of becoming the biggest Mobile money agent in the western province. Opening up more outlets will give Mundia more profits, which  will help him provide a better life for his wife and children.

In the video, a representative from Mobile Transactions is interviewing Mundia.

loans.use: To open another mobile money shop

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a woman with five children between the ages of 20 and 30. Only one of her children is attending school. She sells clothes in a shop which she operates from her home. She has been doing so for the past three years, dreaming of opening a boutique in the future. Grace owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She joined Yehu to access funds, and she describes food to be her greatest monthly expense. Her major challenge is high transport cost and bad roads which are worsened during rainy season.
With the loan, she will purchase bundles of clothes for sale.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a 42-year-old married woman. She has two children who are between 9 and 13 years old. She describes herself to be a go-getter and an honest woman. She operates a retail store where she sells clothing materials. She has been involved in this business for four years and employs two staff members. Her business is located in a viable business environment and her primary customers are local residents.

In addition, Emily runs two other businesses: poultry and selling fish. She describes her biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. She will use the KES 80,000 loan to purchase clothing material to sell. Emily has five prior loans, which she managed to repay well. Her business goal is to run a poultry wholesale business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will improve the living standard of people by providing clothes .

loans.use: to buy clothing material to sell

loans.name: Chamroeun's Group

texts.en:
A 55-year-old widow, Chamroeun has three children. One of them is a dependent daughter. She has struggled to feed her children by farming rice on one-hectare farmland as her primary source of family income. She supplements her income by selling vegetables to better feed her children. She has been in this business for almost thirty years. With her current business, she manages to earn around 21,000 KHR per day to support her family's expenses. 

This is Chamroeun's first loan with VisionFund. She is leading a group consisting of three female members living in the same village to apply for a loan with VisionFund of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and some vegetables for her business. She hopes to make more income and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland and some vegetables for her business.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Shakuul

texts.en: Shakuul lives together with her husband and 4 children at Edudrom near Cape Coast. Her husband is a laborer at the University of Cape Coast. Shakuul operates a grocery shop which she has done for 8 years. The items in her grocery shop are rice, cooking oil, tin fish, tin tomatoes, milo, different kinds of drinks, biscuits, toffees, milk, and soap.  Shakuul uses her income to support her husband in paying their children’s school fees. She will use her loan to purchase a variety of groceries to sell. With the new profit, Shakuul plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en: Comfort produces charcoal for sale at Edukrom near Cape Coast, which she has done for 4 years now. Comfort is married and has 2 children. She uses her income to support her husband in feeding their children and paying their children’s school fees. Comfort will use her loan to purchase firewood to  produce charcoal to sell. With the new profit from her expanded business, Comfort will produce the charcoal in large quantities.

loans.use: to purchase firewood to produce charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en: Theresa is a food vendor. She cooks different kinds of food for sale. Some of the foods she sells are rice, yams, and banku. Theresa serves her food with vegetable sauce, fried fish, and meat stew at Edukrom near Cape Coast. She is married and has 2 children. Her husband is a driver. She has been in this business for some years now. She uses her income to support her husband in feeding their children. Theresa will use her loan to purchase bags of rice, maize, yams, meat, vegetables, and other ingredients she will need to cook the food she sells. With the new profit, Theresa plans to acquire a place to serve her customers.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, maize, yams, meat, vegetables, and other ingredients she will need to cook the food she sells.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is married with three children and two of her children go to school. She has a restaurant business. She has been in this business for four years. She has applied for a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bunches of bananas, beef, rice, chicken and fish.  She works in the business six days a week.  Rose's major business challenges are defaulters and the increasing price of foodstuffs in Uganda.  She hopes to see her restaurant grow into a fully stocked one and to build her own house.  She resides in a rented house and the family doesn’t have access to electricity or piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bananas, beef, chicken, rice and fish

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua operates a grocery shop at Edukrom near Cape Coast. She has done this for 2 years. The items in her grocery shop are tin fish, tin tomatoes, milo, different kinds of drinks, biscuits, toffees, milk, soap, etc. She is a married and has 5 children. Efua uses her income to support her husband in paying their children's school fees. She will use her loan to purchase a variety of groceries to sell. With the new profit, Efua plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is a 37-year-old woman with four children, three of whom attend school. She is married to Hamadi, a carpenter who assists her with daily bread. Mwanasha owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She has been a farmer for the last three years, dreaming of purchasing a tractor in the future. Seasonality is her major challenge as she depends on rain for her farming. She sells her farm produce at the market to the local residents. She joined Yehu to get access to loans.

With the loan, she plans to prepare her farm and purchase planting materials.

loans.use: to prepare her farm and purchase planting materials.

loans.name: Heriberto

texts.es:
El señor Heriberto tiene 31 años de edad es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde muy pequeño sea dedicado a realizar trabajos agrícolas, pues él era el mayor de sus hermanos y tenia que ayudarle a su papá. Cuando él se caso a los 18 años ya trabajaba cultivando de 14,000 metros cuadrados a 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

Los insumos agrícolas, los compra en una ciudad que esta a 10 kilómetros de su vivienda, luego tiene que pagar un vehiculo para transportarlos a su casa y después los traslada en una carreta hasta el lugar donde tiene los cultivos que esta a un kilómetro y medio de su casa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando don Heriberto es para comprar abono, semilla,  fertilizantes y para preparar la tierra para la siembra. Con la inversión dispondrá del dinero para realizar sus cultivos que representa la fuente de ingresos para toda su familia. Él desea construir una nueva vivienda para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sr. Heriberto is 31 years old, married, and has four children. He has engaged in farm work from a very young age since he was the oldest of his siblings and had to help his father. When he got married at the age of 18, he was already cultivating a plot of land that measured 14,000 square meters and was also responsible for another 21,000 square meters of land for growing corn.

His farming supplies are purchased in a city that is 10 kilometers from his home. He must pay a courier to have the supplies transported to his house. Afterwards, he uses a wheelbarrow to carry the products to where his crops are located, which is 1.5 kilometers from his house.

The loan Heriberto is requesting will be used to buy compost, seeds, and fertilizers so that he can prepare his land for planting. With this investment, he will have available funds for growing his crops, which represent income for his entire family. Heriberto wants to build a new home so that he can provide his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Kimsoeng's Group

texts.en:
Kimsoeng is 37 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural village of the Mongkol Borey district, Cambodia, where crop farming is a common way to earn a living. She has three children, two of whom are dependent. Like other villagers, she is a rice farmer who has been in this business to make a living for several years. With her current business, she manages to earn around 28,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan for Kimsoeng and she is leading a group which consists of four female members who live in the same village to apply for a loan with VisionFund of 1,000,000 KHR each. She is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to make more rice and sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living and to buy a hand tractor for her farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a woman who is married to a farmer. They have three children, all of whom are in school. She operates a kiosk selling to her neighbors. This kiosk has been operating for the past two years, and her aim is to open a wholesale in the future. Florence owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She describes credit defaulters to be a major challenge to her business and reports that she spends most of her income on food for the family over the month.
Florence intends to add to her stock of maize flour, sugar, and rice using the requested loan of KES 10,000.

loans.use: to add to her stock of maize flour, sugar, and rice.

loans.name: Costantina

texts.es:
Constantina tiene 49 años, está casada con Wilfredo desde hace 15 años. Tienen 8 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos, los menores. Su casa es propia y está ubicada en la localidad de Estanque.
Todas las mañanas, gracias a la producción de las 9 vacas que tiene, realiza queso, un promedio de 8 a 9 moldes diarios, los cuales vende a los pobladores de su zona. También poseer 5 toros, que le ayudan en el arado de la tierra para poder comenzar con la siembra. Cuenta que también alquila sus toros a otros agricultores que lo necesiten. Su principal actividad es la producción de papa, alverja y maíz en sus propios terrenos agrícolas. 
Por otro lado, su esposo también trabaja como vigilante de la antena de una televisora local. 
En la actualidad, Constantina se encuentra un poco enferma, pero eso no la amilana y como siempre se encuentra trabajando para seguir adelante.

Ella pertenece al grupo “La Colpa” y éste es su tercer préstamo con MFP. Agradece el apoyo que le brindan, ya que adquiere el capital de trabajo que necesita para poder trabajar y progresar en su negocio. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que los integrantes de su asociación son personas solidarias y responsables.
Constantina invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para distribuirlos entre sus sembríos de papa, de la variedad yungay básica.
texts.en:
Constantina is 49 years old and she has been married to Wilfredo for 15 years.  They have eight children but only the three youngest live with them.  They have their own home and it is located in Estanque.

Every morning, thanks to the production of their nine cows, they make cheese (they make 8 to 9 molds daily) and they sell them to the people in the region.  They also have five bulls which help them plow the land so that they can begin planting.  Additionally, they rent their bulls to other farmers when those farmers need them.  Their main crops (grown on their own farmland) are potatoes, peas and corn.

Furthermore, Constantina's husband works as a caretaker at the local television station.  Currently, Constantina is a bit sick but this does not hold her back, as she is always working to get ahead.

She belongs to the group "La Colpa" and this is her third loan with MFP.  She is thankful for the support that they provide her and for supplying the capital she needs to be able to work and to grow her business.  She promises to be punctual with her payments, especially because the members of the association are supportive and responsible people.  Constantina will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers so that she can fertilize her potato crops, which are of the basic Yungay variety.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Alterick

texts.en: With the dream of being a small-business owner, Alterick started his own firm, which provides legal and consulting services to businesses in Atlanta. He was initially attracted to the legal and business services fields due to his love for investigative research and problem solving. He is truly multi-talented and offers an incredible diversity of services to meet his clients' needs at the intersection of the corporate and government sectors. Through dedication and hard work, Alterick has successfully secured numerous loyal clients while continuing to grow his business. His relentless efforts have helped him sustain his business through the economic recession and continuing technology upgrades. In addition to upgrades to the company's website, Alterick hopes to develop marketing materials to give to prospective clients. In addition, he will use this loan to purchase better software and office equipment that will help him meet the needs of his ever-expanding business. He has a clear long-term vision for his firm and this loan will help secure the success of his business.

loans.use: to purchase better financial software and new office equipment

loans.name: Haji

texts.en:
Haji is a man who is married to Mwajame. They have seven children, five of whom are in school. He has been operating a Coca-Cola depot for the last two years, selling to the general public. His aim is to own a wholesale and hire employees. He experiences the challenge of market competition in his place of operation. Haji owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. He joined Yehu purposefully to get loans to boost his business.
The loan will help him to purchase crates of soda for sale.

loans.use: to purchase crates of soda for sale.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en: Alicia is a recent college graduate in IT and entrepreneur at heart. After graduation, she started her own eco-friendly vehicle detailing service through the franchise, DetailXPerts, which uses steam-cleaning methods to conserve water and energy. As a first-time business owner in the early stages of operation, Alicia is responsible for marketing, management and all other aspects of business. She is incredibly dedicated to continuing the expansion of her business and plans to undergo a four-month training program to further her expertise in client outreach. With the help of this loan, Alicia will grow her business to accommodate her ever increasing number of clients. She would like to purchase an additional generator, uniforms, business cards, and insurance as well as initiate a new marketing campaign. Alicia aspires to grow her business so that she is able to employ residents of her native community of Detroit.

loans.use: to purchase a generator, uniforms, insurance and marketing materials

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha owns a grocery business, which she has been operating for one year now. She is married to Ali and they have a single child who is grown up. She is operating her grocery from home, selling to her neighbors. Her aim is to open a kiosk in future. She faces the major challenge of market competition. Asha lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Other sources of income include earnings from her spouse. The loan of KES 30,000 will enable her to purchase fruits and vegetables to add stock to her grocery.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables to add stock to her grocery.

loans.name: Maria Deysi

texts.es:
María  es una mujer de 37 años de edad, estado civil soltera y sin hijos, Vive  en casa  con sus padres . Ella vive en la zona rural del Caserío Peñarol del distrito de Tambogrande y cuenta con servicio de luz.
La actividad que desarrolla María es la crianza de animales menores (ovinos, caprinos porcinos y aves de corral), lo cual lo comercializa en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 3 años aproximadamente; es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.
El monto del crédito solicitado es de 1100 nuevos soles y lo utilizará para la compra de alimento balanceado para engordar a aves y ovinos además para la compra de ganado para engordarlo y posteriormente venderlo. Esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is a 37-year-old single woman without children.  She lives in her own house with her parents and siblings.  The house, which has electricity, is located in the village of Peñarol, a community of approximately 90 families in the Tambogrande district of the department of Piura.

The work María carries out is raising small farm animals (sheep, goats, pigs, and fowl), which she sells in the local market.  She has done this work for approximately three years.  That is, she knows the field very well.

The amount of the loan requested is 1100 nuevos soles (PEN), which will be used to invest in buying the feed and vitamins for her animals.  This will allow her to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her animals.

loans.name: Mwanamkasi

texts.en: Mwanamkasi is taking another loan of KES 30,000 to expand on her existing business. With the loan, she intends to purchase stocks of wheat flour, sugar, rice, and cooking oil. She states that her business is progressing well and that she has had an increase in customers since she borrowed the previous loan due because she is better able to meet their demands. Her family is also living well because she is more able to meet their basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of wheat flour, sugar, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Elmer Arsenio

texts.es:
Elmer es un hombre de 32 años de edad, estado civil casado y con 02 hijos, Vive en casa de sus padres  con su cónyuge y sus hijos. La casa está ubicada en el Caserío Los Riojas del distrito de Túcume y cuenta con servicio de luz y agua, el lugar es una comunidad de aproximadamente 200 familias.
La actividad que desarrolla Elmer es la comercialización de animales menores (ovinos, caprinos porcinos y aves de corral), lo cual lo comercializa en su mismo domicilio. Esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres quiénes le enseñaron todo al respecto.  Con los ingresos que obtiene cubre sus gastos y los de su familia.
El monto del crédito solicitado es de 1000 nuevos soles, los cuales se emplearán para invertir en la culminación de la construcción de su casa en un terreno que heredó de su familia, para vivir más cómodamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer is a 32 year old married man with two children.  He lives in his parents’ house with his wife and children.  The house is located in Caserío Los Riojas in Túcume District and it has electricity.  The place is a community of approximately 200 families.

The activity Elmer carries out is raising small farm animals (sheep, goats, pigs and barnyard fowl) that are sold in the local market.  This activity has been going on for four years approximately; that is to say he knows it to perfection. 

His wife also works selling food from home and has regular customers.

The amount of the requested loan is 1000 new soles to use to finish building his house on land that he inherited from his family, so that he may live more comfortably with his family.

loans.use: to finish building his home

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is a married woman with five children, three of whom are in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. For the last three years, she has been operating a kiosk, selling to her neighbors. Rehema describes market competition to be her major challenge. She says she spends most of her income on school fees and food for the family over the month. Her aim is to open a shop in the future. She joined Yehu because of their nice products. Other sources of income include earnings from her husband who is a fishmonger.
The loan will enable her to purchase stocks of wheat flour, rice, beans, and sugar.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of wheat flour, rice, beans, and sugar.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a 40-year-old married woman with seven children, one of whom is in school. She has been selling khangas to the general public for the last 10 years. Her aim is to open a clothing shop in the future. Mwanasiti lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She also sells coconuts and cereals as her side businesses. She describes price fluctuation and market competition to be her major challenges.
With the loan of KES 50,000, she plans to purchase pieces of khanga for sale.

loans.use: to purchase pieces of khanga for sale.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 50 años de edad, es conviviente y no tiene carga familiar. Vive en casa propia hace más de 5 años, en el Caserío Froilán Alama del Distrito de Las Lomas en Tambogrande. Pedro vive en la parte rural  de este distrito y  solo cuenta con servicios básicos.

La actividad que desarrolla Pedro es la venta de artículos de primera necesidad (abarrotes, bebidas, golosinas) en su propio domicilio, lo cual atiende diariamente a clientes conocidos de la zona, esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace mas de 5 años.  Paralelamente se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cabras y gallinas, las cuales comercializa en el mercado local.

Pedro desea comprar una moto lineal para su traslado personal ya que caserío donde vive queda alejado del pueblo, y esto dificulta el desarrollo de sus actividades, es por ello que para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 2500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Pedro is 50 years old, lives with his partner, and does not have any children. He has lived in his own home for 5 years, in the hamlet of Froilán Alma in the district of Las Lomas in Tambogrande. Pedro lives in the rural part of this district and only has basic services. 

Pedro’s business is selling basic needs products like groceries, beverages, and cookies.  He has this small store set up in his own home, where he tends to his loyal customers. He has engaged in this activity for five years.

He also raises goats and chickens in pens outside of his house, which he sells at the local market. 

Pedro would like to purchase a motorcycle for personal transport since the neighborhood in which he lives is far from the town, and this makes it hard to develop his activities. These circumstances are why he is requesting a new loan for the amount of 2,500 soles.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to get from his home to town

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es:
Florentino tiene 28 años, está casado con Yolanda desde hace 4 años. Tienen 3 hijos menores, a los que cuidan en una casa alquilada ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.
Desde hace varios años realizó su principal sueño; abrir su propio restaurante donde vende comida china. Desde las primeras horas del día, hasta el anochecer, gracias a su buena sazón y rapidez en la atención obtiene muchos clientes. Cuenta que los días donde tiene mayores ingresos son los fines de semana, donde los pobladores pasan un momento en familia, consumiendo los ricos platos que prepara. Como el trabajo es muy sacrificado y requiere de mucho esfuerzo, su esposa le ayuda en la atención de los clientes, “ella es la mesera”, comenta.
Ahora su próximo proyecto es culminar de construir su casa, ya que hace algunos años compró su terreno, y ya le falta muy poco y espera culminar otro de sus sueños.

Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP, donde obtuvo el apoyo que tanto necesitaba. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que su asociación lo integran personas responsables con él.
Florentino invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de la comida para su restaurante. Con otra parte adquirirá tierra, palos y otros materiales para terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Florentino is 28 years old, he has been married to Yolanda for 4 years, they have three young children, and they live in a house that they rent in Pampas.

His dream came true a few years ago when he opened his own Chinese food restaurant.  From the early morning hours until late at night, thanks to his good cooking and great customer service, he attracts and serves many customers.  The weekends are when he earns most of his income because that is when most people spend time with their families and eat the delicious dishes that he prepares.  Because he is busy cooking (which requires a lot of effort), his wife helps serve the customers (she is the waitress).

Now his next project is to complete the building of his own home.  A few years ago he bought land (the house is already very close to completion) and now he hopes to complete this other dream.

This is his second loan from MFP, where he received the support for everything he needed.  He promises to be punctual with his payments because the association is comprised of responsible people.

Florentino will invest the money in the purchase of ingredients for the preparation of food in his restaurant.  With a part of the money, he will also buy wood and other materials to finish building his home.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for the food he makes in his restaurant.

loans.name: Jerida

texts.en:
Jerida is a widowed woman. She has 11 children with ages ranging from 17 years to 42 years. She describes herself as patient, polite, and ambitious. She operates a retail store where she cuts glasses and provides window repair services. She has been involved in this business for 25 years and employs 1 staff member.

Her business is located near a busy competitive area and her primary customers are tenants and local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be frequent breakages of glasses. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy another glass cutter. Previously, Jerida borrowed loans of KES 20,000, 30,000 and 40,000 which she managed to pay back. Her business goal is to expand her business and become a supplier of glasses to retailers within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to educate her son to university level with the profits that will be generated.

loans.use: to buy a glass cutter.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es: Ana Cristina de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos , ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene mucha experiencia en este rubro pues tiene varias años de dedicarse a este negocio, el terreno donde siembra es altamente agrícola y en esos mismos alrededores lo comercia, tiene muy buena clientela pues ellos saben que lo que vende Ana es de primera calidad y siempre a excelentes precios, además es muy servicial, es una mujer trabajadora, le  gusta buscar nuevos retos porque ama su labor, con la última cosecha no logro abarcar la demanda y ahora quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, etc. Ana Cristina tiene la seguridad que con las ganancias que obtendrá podrá pagar el financiamiento tiene muy buenas referencias y tiene de respaldo el apoyo de su esposo, al mismo tiempo sabe que así podrá regalarle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Ana Cristina is forty-eight years old and she lives with her life partner and their children. She is a famer, and she grows maize and sorghum. She has a lot of experience in this field because she has been engaged in this activity for many years. She sows a very good farming land and she sells her products in the nearby. She can count on many good customers who know that Ana always sells high quality products at excellent prices; on top of this she is a very helpful and hardworking woman, and she likes facing new challenges because she loves her job. Thanks to her last harvest she succeeded in satisfying all of her customers’ requests and she now wants to improve her production; but to do so she needs working capital, and for this reason she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy maize and sorghum seeds and fertilizers. Ana Cristina is sure that with the earnings she will make she will be able to repay the loan. She can count on good references and she is backed up by her husband. At the same time she knows that this way she will provide her family with everything they need.

loans.use: To buy maize and sorghum seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Matano

texts.en:
Matano  is a married man. He has four children with ages ranging from five to 11 years old. He describes himself to be trustworthy, resilient and a loving father. He operates rental houses where he provides rental-housing services. He has been involved in this business for seven years. His business is located within a strategically positioned business environment where he gets steady income and his primary customers are local residents .

In addition, Matano sells water to the local residents in order to increase his income. He describes his biggest business challenge to be building more houses for rental accommodations. He will use the KES 100,000 loan to purchase a water tank. Earlier on, Matano had taken a loan of KES 60,000, which he successfully repaid in full. His business goal is to build more houses to provide accommodations within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children using his profits.

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga tiene 36 años, está casada con Amador desde hace 17 años. Tienen cuatro hijos menores a los que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Paltarumi.
Como buena mujer del campo sus días se concentran en criar a sus animales. Tiene 3 vacas (todas preñadas), cerdos y ovejas, a los que cuida con mucha dedicación, pues los venderá cuando estén maduros. La leche que producen sus vacas la leche que comercializa siempre en su localidad. Paralelo a ese trabajo, y con la ayuda de su esposo, se dedica a la siembra de alverja, maíz y papa, en terrenos agrícolas propios y arrendados, los que en cada cosecha comercializa a la ciudad de Pampas, donde tiene clientes fijos. Pero como la campaña agrícola no es constante, también trabaja en otros terrenos agrícolas, como jornalera, en su tiempo libre.

Ella pertenece al grupo “La Colpa” y éste es su segundo préstamo con MFP. Agradece el apoyo que le brindan, ya que adquiere el capital de trabajo que necesita para poder trabajar y progresar en su negocio. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que los integrantes de su asociación son personas solidarias y responsables.
Olga invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de alverja y de papa, también adquirirá fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Olga, 36, has been married to Amador for 17 years.  They have four young children they take care of in their own house located in the town of Paltarumi.  

As a good farm woman, her days are focused on raising her animals.  She has three cows (all pregnant), pigs, and sheep that she takes care of with a lot of dedication because she will sell them when they are mature.  She always sells the milk her cows produce in her town.

Parallel to this job and with the help of her husband, she grows peas, corn, and potatoes on their own and leased crop lands.  At every harvest she sells these crops in the city of Pampas, where she has steady customers.  As the agriculture season is not steady, however, in her spare time she also works as a day laborer on other crop lands.

She belongs to the La Colpa group and this is her second loan with MFP.  She is grateful for the support they give her because she acquires the working capital she needs to be able to work and make progress in her business.  She promises to be punctual with her payments because the members of her bank are supportive and responsible people.

Olga will invest the money requested in buying pea and potato seed.  She also will get natural fertilizer to spread on her fields.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Annastasia

texts.en:
Annastacia is a married woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 15 years to 25 years. She describes herself as diligent, God-fearing, and determined. She operates a retail store where she sells items such as cereals, sugar, salt, tea leaves, bread, tomatoes, onions, wheat, etc. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located within a busy town and her primary customers are neighborhood residents. 

Besides this business, Annastacia does farming to increase her income in order to support the family. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of insufficient funds for buying more stock because of the high prices of the items. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy sacks of maize, beans, wheat, cooking fat, and green grains. Her business goal is to buy a pick-up to help in transportation of the items to customers within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize, beans, wheat, green grains, and cooking fat.

loans.name: Resty

texts.en: Resty is married with one child. Her only child goes to school. Resty doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a retail shop selling used shoes and phone accessories. She has been in this business for 4 years. She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shilling from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes and phone accessories. Besides this retail shop business, she is a poultry farmer and works from her home. She sells to all categories of people and works from her home. Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters.  She is aspiring to see her business grow big so that she can own a fully stocked phone accessories shop and also build her own house. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bales of used clothes and more phone accessories.

loans.name: Viviana Elena

texts.es:
Viviana tiene 29 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Viviana y su familia viven en el Caserío  Pedregal Bajo del distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

La actividad que desarrolla Viviana es la crianza de ovinos, aves de corral y cerdos los cuales las ofrece en venta  en el mercado local, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo.  Paralelamente cuenta con 1,0 has de terreno agrícola sembrado de limón que cosecha semanalmente

Viviana desea adquirir un terreno agrícola de 0,50 has para la siembra de limón, lo cual le permitirá seguir creciendo y ayudarse, por lo que ha decidido  solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles.

Viviana es conocida en la zona, sus vecinos la consideran como una persona trabajadora y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es tener éxito en su actual cosecha y en las cosechas futuras para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Viviana is a woman of 29 years in a civil marriage and with two children in her care.  She lives in her own house with her spouse and children.  Viviana lives in the district of Tambogrande, a district that is primarily dedicated to growing fruit which are then processed for exportation to other countries. It belongs to the department of Piura, in the region of the same name, which is three hours from the city of Chiclayo. 

The commercial activity practiced by Viviana is the growth and sale of sheep and poultry which she then offers for sale in the local market, when they are fully formed. She also has one acre of land upon which she grows lemons which she harvests weekly. 

Viviana wants to acquire a half acre of land for lemon crops, which will allow her to continue growing and help her. This is why she has asked Edpyme for a credit of 3000 new soles. 

Viviana is known in the area, and her neighbors consider her to be a hard working and responsible person. Her biggest goal is to be successful in her current crop and in future crops to get her family ahead.

loans.use: to buy half an acre of land for her lemon crop

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
Teodora tiene 66 años, esta casada con Héctor desde hace 50 años. Tuvieron siete hijos producto de su amor. Ahora sólo viven con uno de ellos, Héctor, a quien cuidan en su casa propia en la localidad de San Pedro de Saño. 
Hace 12 años implementó una tienda de comestibles en su vivienda a fin de poder tener una vida más tranquila, ya que su esposo se jubiló, pues trabajaba como obrero en una mina. Es por eso que decidieron seguir trabajando, pero de  manera independiente. Es así que Teodora es la encargada principal de la atención de su establecimiento. Las mayores ganancias las recibe en las fechas festivas en su localidad; como las fiestas patronales, fiestas patrias, día de los santos, etc. Teodora no desaprovecha ninguna oportunidad para crecer, es por ello que siempre está al pendiente de innovar y mejorar su tienda para mantenerse activa. Pero como nació de padres agricultores, no deja de sembrar productos como papa, habas y maíz, los cuales negocia cuando el precio del mercado es muy bueno, pero si se abarata los reparte entre sus hijos para el consumo propio. Ahora ella se encuentra recuperándose de una operación al apéndice.

Pertenece al grupo “Cantuta” y éste es el crédito número 13 que tiene con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo que le permite seguir en su negocio. Promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que su asociación lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias.
Teodora invertirá el dinero solicitado en surtir su tienda de comestibles con productos alimenticios de buena calidad.
texts.en:
66-year old Teodora has been married to Héctor for fifty years and they had seven children. Now only one of them still lives with them, and they care for him in their own house in San Pedro de Saño. 

Twelve years ago Teodora opened a grocery store in her house so they could have a calmer life when her husband retired from his job as a laborer in a mine. They decided to carry on working, but on their own terms. Teodora’s main responsibility is serving in the shop. She makes the most sales when there are festivities in the town, such as Fiestas Patronales, Fiestas Patrias, Día de los Santos etc. 

Teodora takes advantage of every opportunity to earn more money. She’s always ready to try something new and improve the store. And as she comes from farming parents, she always plants potatoes, beans, and corn which she sells when the prices in the market are good. Of course the prices are cheaper for her children. Currently Teodora is recuperating from appendicitis.
She belongs to the Cantuta group, and this is the 13th loan she has had with MFP with whom she is very pleased. She receives support from the institution for her business. Teodora promises to make the repayments punctually as her group is made up of responsible, committed people. She will use her share of the money to stock her store with good quality items.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Arístides

texts.es:
Arístides tiene 46 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador. Vive en compañía de sus hermanas y sobrinos, a quienes quiere mucho y cuida. La casa donde viven es propia y se ubica en la localidad de Pampas.
Durante el día permanece en la localidad donde se encuentra sus terrenos agrícolas. Ahí cuida de sus sembríos de papa, alverja y maíz. La comercialización la realiza dependiendo el precio de venta del mercado, por ejemplo; si se encuentran baratos, los vende en sus mismos terrenos; pero si hay demanda, los traslada a la capital del país, donde obtiene mayores ganancias.
Adicionalmente se dedica a la compra y venta ganado, ahora tiene 2 vacas que dentro de muy poco venderá, como también comenzará con la compra de toros y ovejas que comercializará a la feria ganadera de la ciudad. Ahora su proyecto es mejorar la calidad de sus papas, por ello es uno de los que siembra una variedad orgánica, que crece con nutrientes naturales, cuya característica es ser grande en tamaño.

Él pertenece al grupo “La Colpa” y éste es su cuarto préstamo con MFP. Agradece el apoyo que le brindan, ya que adquiere el capital de trabajo que necesita para poder trabajar y progresar en su negocio. Además, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que los integrantes de su asociación son personas solidarias y responsables.
Arístides invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de guano de gallina (fertilizante natural) para su próxima siembra de alverja y papa.
texts.en:
Arístides is 46 years old, he is single, and he is a worker.  He lives with his sisters and nephews for whom he loves and cares for very much.  They own the house that they live in and it is located in Pampas.

During the day he stays in the region because that is where his farmland is located, and he cares for his potatoes, peas, and corn crops.  The sales of his crops depend on the price set at the market.  For example, if people find that the prices are low, then the crops are sold there.  But if there is a demand, then he takes his crops to the capital where he can make a bigger profit.

Additionally, he buys and sells cattle.  He now has two cows that he will soon sell.  He will also begin to buy bulls and sheep that he will sell in the cattle market in the city.  

Right now his project is to improve the quality of his potatoes because he is one of only a few farmers that grow organic potatoes.  They contain natural nutrients and are characterized by their large size.

He belongs to the group "La Colpa" and this is his forth loan with MFP.  He is thankful for the support that MFP provides because he has access to the capital he needs to be able to work and grow his business.  Furthermore, he promises to be punctual with his payments because the association is comprised of responsible people.

Arístides will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of chicken manure (natural fertilizer) for the next planting cycle of his peas and potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase natural fertilizers.

loans.name: César

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 54 años, es un hombre sincero, responsable y honrado. Vive en compañía de Maritza, su esposa, desde hace 22 años. Tienen 4 hijos a los que criaron con mucho amor en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampa Blanca. Ahora solo viven con una de ellas, Maricruz.   

En todos estos años realizó muchas actividades; una de ellas fue el oficio de albañil en la capital, de donde obtiene la mayor cantidad de ingresos económicos para mantener a su familia. La otra actividad es la siembra de maíz, olluco, quinua y trigo en terrenos alquilados y con socios, los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa a la ciudad de Lima.
A raíz de ello, se le ocurrió vender granos verdes,  junto a sus hijos comenzó este negocio, que con el tiempo fue muy rentable. 
Pero la actividad que le gusta más es la crianza de animales, cuenta con vacas, toros y chivos,  los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación y cuando tiene algún apuro económico los vende al carnicero que le ofrezca un mejor precio. 

Él pertenece al banco comunal “Pampa Blanca” y éste es el crédito número 10 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su grupo, donde los integrantes son personas con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos. 
César invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios kilos de granos verdes, para abastecer el negocio que tiene con sus hijos.
texts.en:
César is 54 years old, and he is a sincere, responsible and honest man. He lives with Maritza, his wife of 22 years. He has 4 children whom they have raised with deep love in their own house, located in Pampa Blanca. At the moment only one of them, Maricurz, lives with them.

All over the years he has been engaged in many activities; one of them is working as a mason in the capital city, where he earns the best wage he uses to provide for his family. Another of his activities is growing maize, ulluco (a root vegetable), quinoa and wheat in some lands he rents with a few partners. After every harvest he sells his products in the town of Lima.

As a consequence of this second activity, he has come up with the idea of selling raw grains: he started this activity with his children, and in time this has proven to be a very profitable activity.

However, the activity he likes the most is livestock breeding. He has cows, bulls and billy goats whom he cares for with great commitment; when he finds himself economically in need, he sells them to the butcher offering him the best price.

He is a member of the “Pampa Blanca” Communal Bank, and this is the 10th loan he has requested to MFP. He is happy with his Communal Bank, as he has been working for many years with his group, whose members are people greatly willing to help each other out.

César will invest the loan he has requested in the purchase of various kilograms of raw grains, in order to stock up the activity he runs with her children.

loans.use: To buy raw grains to sell.

loans.name: Zacharia

texts.en: Zachariah is a married businessman. He has 2 children ages 15 years and 20 years. He describes himself to be visionary and aggressive. He operates a retail store where he sells household items such as fridges, electronics, etc. He has been involved in this business for 6 years and employs 2 staff members. His business is located at a busy market and his primary customers are tenants. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy more electronics and fridges. Earlier on, Zachariah had taken a loan of KES 50,000 which he managed to repay. His business goal is to run another retail store within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will run a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy more fridges and electronics for selling.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia es una mujer muy laboriosa, tiene tres hijos y vive junto a su esposo en su casa propia.
Su actividad es la venta de abarrotes en la tienda que abrió en su misma vivienda, hace 10 años. Para ella, en su trabajo, lo más importante es atender con amabilidad a sus clientes, por eso este negocio le sale rentable porque siempre tiene ingresos económicos. El problema es cuando su tienda se ve vacía, y no muy atractiva. Con el tiempo, desea vender productos al por mayor.

Éste es su cuarto crédito con MFP y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero. En su banco comunal es una socia activa y solidaria. 
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita comprará productos para su tienda.
texts.en:
Eugenia is a very hardworking woman; she has three children and lives with her husband in her own house.

Her activity is selling groceries in a store she opened at home ten years ago.  For her, what is most important at work is to treat her customers with kindness which is why her store is profitable and always produces income.  The problem is when the store is empty and not very attractive.  In time, she’d like to be a wholesaler.

This is her 4th MFP loan and she feels grateful for the financial support.  She’s an active, supportive member of her communal bank.

She will use the requested 3000 new soles to buy products for her store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Enedina

texts.es:
Enedina tiene 36 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Carlos, de 42 años, y sus cuatro hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. 
Ella es una mujer de mucho trabajo, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en el puesto que implementó en su domicilio. Su esposo le ayuda con el trabajo de campo, cultiva cacao y café. Las ganancias de ambas actividades les generan un buen sustento para mejorar su calidad de vida. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede estar tranquila al pendiente de sus hijos.

Éste es su cuarto crédito con MFP y se siente contenta por el apoyo brindado. Se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago, de forma responsable.
Con los 4,000 nuevos soles que solicita abastecerá su negocio con barrotes. También comprará fertilizantes y abono para su parcela.
texts.en:
Enedina, 36, lives in her own house with her husband, Carlos, 42, and their four children who she wants to provide a better quality of life for.

She is a very hardworking woman.  She sells groceries in a stand she set up at home.  Her husband helps her working in the fields; he grows cocoa beans and coffee.  Profits from both activities generate good support to improve their quality of life.  What she likes best about her work is that she can have peace of mind because she can take care of her children.

This is her 4th MFP loan and she feels happy because of the help provided.  She commits to be punctual and to make her installment payments in a responsible way.

She will use the requested 4000 new soles to stock her store with groceries.  She’ll also buy fertilizer and manure for her parcel of farmland.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anatolio

texts.es:
Anatolio es un hombre de mucha labor. Tiene 40 años y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Victoria, de 30 años, y sus tres hijos.
Su labor está en la chacra, donde tiene cultivadas plantas de cacao. Lleva en esta actividad 15 años y en los tiempos de cosecha siempre cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros para extraer de forma más rápida los frutos.  Su cosecha la lleva a comercializar a los centros de acopio de su localidad, donde obtiene buenas ganancias, por ser de muy buena calidad. 
Con el tiempo, desea ampliar su parcela cultivando más plantas de cacao; pero por ahora quiere eliminar las malezas que aquejan e impiden su buen crecimiento.

Éste es su cuarto crédito con MFP y una vez más agradece al apoyo que le brindan. Asimismo, seguirá siendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es un socio  activo y participe de las reuniones que realizan. 
Con el préstamo que ahora solicita comprará abono para esparcir en su campo de cultivo.
texts.en:
Anatolio is a very hardworking man.  He’s 40 years old and lives in his own house with his wife, Victoria, 30, and their three children.

His work is in the fields where he grows cocoa beans.  He’s been in this activity for 15 years and during harvest season hires day workers to help him extract the beans more quickly.  He sells his harvests in his local gathering centers where he earns good profits because they are of very good quality.

In time, he’d like to expand his fields and grow more cocoa bean plants but for now he needs to eliminate the weeds that harm and prevent their good growth.

This is his 4th MFP loan and once again he is grateful for the support he’s being given.  He also assures that he will continue to be punctual with his installment payments.  He is a very active, participative member in his communal bank’s meetings.

He will use the loan he’s requesting now to buy manure to spread among his fields.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Ciro

texts.es:
Ciro tiene 39 años, vive con Rayda, de 24 años, en la casa que llegaron a comprar durante el tiempo de convivencia.
Le gusta mucho el deporte, es por ello que su terreno lo amplió para poder hacer un campo deportivo para fútbol. Ahí tiene una tienda pequeña donde vende bebidas y otras golosinas, ya que después de los partidos se dirigen a su puesto a refrescarse. Esta actividad la lleva realizando desde hace 2 años y comenta que le va muy bien y siempre tiene ingresos, porque la gente que sale a realizar deporte, en especial los jóvenes, acuden a su puesto.

Éste es su primer crédito con MFP y se siente orgulloso por la confianza que le brindan, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo, agradece a su banco comunal, por permitirle ser parte de su este grupo tan solidario.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles que solicita comprará gaseosas, galletas y otros productos para su puesto.
texts.en:
Ciro, 39, lives with Rayda, 24, in the house they’ve managed to buy during the time they’ve been together.

He enjoys sports very much so he expanded his lot so that he could install a soccer field.  He has a store there where he sells beverages and other snacks because after the games they come by his stand for refreshments.  He’s been in this activity for two years and he relates that he does very well and always earns income because people, especially youngsters, who come out to play sports come by his stand.

This is his first MFP loan and he feels proud for the trust placed in him which is why he commits to be punctual with his installment payments.  
He also thanks the communal bank for allowing him to be part of such a mutually supportive group.

He will use the 1000 new soles he’s requesting to buy soft-drinks, cookies and other products for his stand.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Eusenia

texts.es:
Eusenia es soltera, vive en la casa de sus padres junto a su pequeño bebé Dairjus, a quien le brinda mucho amor y desea una mejor estadía para un buen futuro.
Ella es una joven laboriosa, con la ayuda de sus padres implementó una tienda de abarrotes, donde puede trabajar tranquila junto a su pequeño hijo. Esta labor la empezó hace un año y comenta que le va muy bien sin tener ninguna dificultad. Sus clientes son regulares porque siempre encuentran en su tienda lo que necesitan para realizar los quehaceres de su hogar. 

Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP y agradece, una vez más, por la confianza que le brindan. Asimismo, reconoce la responsabilidad de sus compañeros de su banco comunal. 
Con el dinero que ahora solicita se abastecerá de abarrotes para su negocio.
texts.en:
Eusenia is single living in her parents’ house with her baby Dairjus who she loves very much and wants better wellbeing for a good future.

She is a hardworking young woman who with help from her parents set up a grocery store to work in at peace with her little son.  This work started a year ago and she comments that she does very well and has no difficulties.  Her customers are regular because they always find what they need for their household chores in the store.

This is her 2nd MFP loan and she is once again grateful for the trust being placed in her.  She also acknowledges the responsibility of her fellow communal bank members.

She will use the money she’s asking for to stock up on groceries for her store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo tiene 45 años, está casado con María, de 47 años. Fruto de esa relación tienen cuatro hijos.
Se dedica al cultivo de cacao, café y hoja de coca. Esta labor la lleva realizando hace 15 años y comenta que en los tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros, con ellos labora la extracción de malezas que aquejan en sus cultivos. Después de tanto tiempo de labor, gracias a su experiencia, obtiene muy buenas cosechas, de las que saca varios sacos de producto que lleva a vender a las asociaciones de cacao y café, donde le pagan muy bien por cada kilo.

Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente gozoso de saber que una vez más contará con el apoyo financiero para seguir con sus planes de trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio que aporta sus opiniones para mantener a su grupo unido. 
Con el dinero facilitado comprará abono para realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Guillermo, 45, is married to María, 47 and they have four children.  He’s a cocoa bean, coffee and coca leaf farmer.  He’s been doing this work for 15 years and comments that he hires day laborers to help with harvesting; they help him remove weeds that afflict his crops.  After so much time working and thanks to his experience he obtains very good harvests that produce several sacks of product that he takes to sell at the cocoa bean and coffee associations where he’s paid very well for each kilo.

This is his second MFP loan so he’s happy that once again he will be able to rely on financial support to continue with his business plans.  He is a member of his communal bank who shares his opinions in order to keep the group united.

He will use the money requested to buy manure for crop maintenance.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Lucía es una mujer viuda de 45 años, vive en su casa propia junto a sus tres hijos, quienes le dan la fuerza para seguir adelante. 
Desde que quedó viuda tuvo que esforzarse para salir adelante con sus hijos. Se dedica a cultivar cacao, esta labor la realizaba con el apoyo de su esposo, pero ahora lo hace con sus hijos, quienes también no permiten que su madre se esfuerce demasiado porque ellos ya tienen la fuerza para hacer los trabajos más duros. Pero para Lucía no hay impedimento alguno para seguir adelante con la labor que durante 26 años ha realizado. Las cosechas que obtiene, de tres a cuatro veces al año, las lleva a vender a los centro de acopio donde le gratifican con buenas ganancias. Para el futuro le gustaría tener una tienda, pero mientras tanto, se dedica sólo a su chacra. 

Éste es su crédito número 6 con MFP y se siente orgullosa por el apoyo que le brindan para seguir con su trabajo. En su banco comunal trabaja con personas responsables, y sobre todo, solidarias. 
Con los  2,000 nuevos soles que solicita comprará abono orgánico para fertilizar sus plantas de cacao.
texts.en:
Lucia is a 45 year old widow.  She lives in her own house with her three children who give her the strength to move forward. 
 
Ever since she was widowed she has had to work hard to get herself and her children ahead.  She grows cocoa.  She used to do this with the help of her husband, now she works with her children who do no allow their mother to work too hard because they now have the ability to perform the hard tasks.  For Lucia there are no obstacles in getting ahead in an activity that she has been doing for 26 years.  The harvest that she get three or four times a year, she takes to the collection centers where she is rewarded with good profits.  In the future she would like to have a store, but for the time being she concentrates her efforts to the farm.

This is her loan number 6 with MFP and she feels proud of the support that she gets to continue with her work.  In her community bank she works with responsible and above all very caring people.

She will use the 2,000 new soles that she is requesting to buy organic fertilizer for her crop of cocoa.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una mujer muy laboriosa, tiene 36 años y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Fortunato, de 38 años, y sus tres preciados hijos.
Su labor la empieza desde muy temprano en su parcela, donde labra la tierra para cultivar plantas de cacao. Ella sabe que la mayoría de sus vecinos se dedican a la agricultura, pero ella se esmera por tener una producción mejor que la de sus vecinos. Le gusta su trabajo porque con la ayuda de su esposo llevan 12 años cosechando buenos frutos, y lo que le resulta un poco difícil es tener que movilizar los sacos de su cosecha hasta la ciudad donde vende sus granos. Con el tiempo, desea en comprarse una moto carguera para que sea más fácil de trasportar sus cultivos; pero por el momento desea quitar la hierba de sus plantas.

Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP y agradece por su confianza, pues así seguirá laborando en lo más le gusta hacer. En su banco comunal es una socia comprometida y estimada por ser muy puntual.
